mailBody:
Dear J.P. Morgan Securities Team,

I hope this email finds you well.

As part of our ongoing compliance and due diligence process, we have conducted a review of the information available for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC. We have identified several items for which we require additional information to complete our records:

1. **Company PEP Screening**: No specific information about the PEP screening process is disclosed in the annual report. Please provide details regarding this process.

2. **Company Revenue Details**: While we have some revenue data for 2023, we would appreciate any further breakdown or details you can provide.

3. **Company Market Capitalization Details**: We have recorded the market capitalization for recent years but would like to confirm these figures or receive any additional context or documentation.

We appreciate your cooperation in providing this information at your earliest convenience to ensure that our records are complete and accurate.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Contact Information]  
[Your Company Name]
